tool.name: Circos: Wiggle to Stacked Histogram
tool.description: collapses multiple (big)Wig files into a single stacked histogram.

param.name: input
param.label: Data files
param.help: It is imperative that ALL of your wig files use the same step and span, and are of the same type (fixedStep or variableStep).

tool.help: Converts standard (big)Wig files into a format appropriate for Circos stacked histogram plot tracks.
